<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * This is a plugin that puts map info into a miniwindow
 * you can use the map to move around by clicking on the exits in the Exits row

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [togglewin]
  * [miniwin]
  * [class]
  * [pluginhelper]
  * [verify]
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * the miniwindow will not show until map info has been received
